label: your potential
description: This card represents what might be, what you could manifest, good or bad.

label: your past
description: This card represents something from your past that is now showing up in your present, something hidden inside of you.

label: your future
description: This card is represents the future of what will happen, or what could happen.

label: your present
description: This card represents is where you are at right now, or where you perceive yourself to be.

label: your reason
description: This card represents something that drives you or holds you back; your excuses, or your passions.
